data.comment: The match has started, with Krasnodar kicking-off.
Can Krasnodar capitalize from this throw-in deep inside Khimki's half?
In the minute 3, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 10, Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Krasnodar are pushing forward but Marcus Berg's finish is wide of the goal.
In the minute 12, It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Khimki.
Krasnodar push upfield but Sergei Ivanov quickly pulls them for offside.
In the minute 16, Throw-in for Krasnodar at Arena Khimki.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Free kick in a good position for Khimki!
In the minute 18, The match at Arena Khimki has been interrupted briefly for a check on Igor Smolnikov, who is down injured.
Aleksandr Troshechkin (Khimki) strikes at Arena Khimki but his header is cleared.
Krasnodar's Igor Smolnikov looks ok and returns to the pitch.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 21, Kaio Pantaleao (Krasnodar) has received a yellow card from Sergei Ivanov.
Khimki are in shooting range from this free kick.
In the minute 23, Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Throw-in for Khimki close to the penalty box.
In the minute 24, Sergei Ivanov signals a Khimki throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
Denis Glushakov (Khimki) goes for goal but the shot is blocked by an alert defence.
Shapi Suleymanov (Krasnodar) is given an opening but the shot is blocked by a defender.
In the minute 27, Krasnodar have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Viktor Claesson of Krasnodar is pulled up for offside.
Can Khimki get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Krasnodar's half?
In the minute 29, Marcus Berg of Krasnodar gets in a strike, but is off target.
Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 32, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
At Arena Khimki, Mohamed Konate has been yellow-carded for the home team.
In the minute 33, Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Khimki have a goal kick.
Vladimir Dyadyun for Khimki drives towards goal at Arena Khimki. But the finish is unsuccessful.
In the minute 34, Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Krasnodar.
Sergei Ivanov awards the away team a throw-in.
Krasnodar awarded a free kick in their own half.
In the minute 36, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Cristian Ramirez gets his shot on target but fails to score for Krasnodar.
In the minute 38, In Khimki, Denis Glushakov of Khimki is presented with a shooting opportunity. But the strike is blocked by the covering defence.
Khimki needs to be cautious. Krasnodar have an attacking throw-in.
Krasnodar's Marcus Berg gets his shot away but it misses the target.
In the minute 40, Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Khimki throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
In the minute 42, Khimki have a goal kick.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
In the minute 45, Krasnodar's Shapi Suleymanov misses with an attempt on goal.
Goal kick for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov will wait an extra 1 minutes before blowing the whistle to end the 1st half.
In the minute 45, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
In Khimki a free kick has been awarded the away team.
The first-half has ended.
Kristoffer Olsson is replacing Tonny Vilhena for the away team.
In the minute 46, Khimki kick-off the second-half u- the match is underway again!
Throw-in Krasnodar.
Throw-in Khimki.
In the minute 48, Throw-in for Krasnodar in the half of Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov awards Krasnodar a goal kick.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar.
In the minute 53, Throw-in for Krasnodar in their own half.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
In the minute 56, Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
It's a goal kick for the home team in Khimki.
Krasnodar to take a throw-in in Khimki territory.
In the minute 59, Krasnodar have a dangerous throw-in.
Free kick for Krasnodar in the half of Khimki.
Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun has been booked in Khimki.
In the minute 60, Krasnodar make their second substitution with Wanderson replacing Viktor Claesson.
Ball goes out of play for a Khimki goal kick.
A throw-in for the away team on the opposite half.
In the minute 62, Khimki awarded a throw-in in their own half.
Kristoffer Olsson's header is off-target for Krasnodar.
Sergei Ivanov awards Khimki a goal kick.
In the minute 66, Denis Glushakov (Khimki) gets in a strike but the shot is blocked by a defender.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
Igor Cherevchenko (Khimki) is making a first substitution, with Reziuan Mirzov replacing Arshak Koryan.
In the minute 67, Goal! A Mohamed Konate header gives Khimki a 1-0 lead in Khimki.
Denis Glushakov instrumental with a fine assist.
Throw-in for Khimki in the half of Krasnodar.
Can Krasnodar get the ball into an attacking position from this throw-in in Khimki's half?
In the minute 68, Daniil Utkin is on a sub for Shapi Suleymanov for Krasnodar.
The away team replace Marcus Berg with Ari.
In the minute 69, Throw-in for Khimki at Arena Khimki.
Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Khimki, close to Krasnodar's area.
In the minute 71, Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Khimki drive upfield and Denis Glushakov gets in a shot. The strike is blocked by a Krasnodar defender.
Khimki have been awarded a corner by Sergei Ivanov.
In the minute 73, Khimki's Kirill Bozhenov misses with an attempt on goal.
Ball goes out of play for a Krasnodar goal kick.
Free kick Khimki.
In the minute 74, Krasnodar push forward at Arena Khimki and Ari gets in a strike. This is blocked, however, by a determined Khimki defence.
Khimki awarded a free kick in their own half.
Attention is being given to Khimki’s Denis Glushakov and play has been suspended briefly.
Khimki’s Denis Glushakov is on his feet again at Arena Khimki.
Krasnodar are whistled for offside.
In the minute 77, Evgeni Chernov is on a sub for Remy Cabella for Krasnodar.
In the minute 78, Khimki's Vladimir Dyadyun is on target but unsuccessful.
Khimki to take a throw-in in Krasnodar territory.
Mohamed Konate for Khimki gets in a strike but fails to hit the target.
In the minute 79, Krasnodar have a goal kick.
Krasnodar's Daniil Utkin gets in a shot on goal at Arena Khimki. But the effort is unsuccessful.
Sergei Ivanov signals a Khimki throw-in in Krasnodar's half.
In the minute 81, Ball safe as Krasnodar is awarded a throw-in in their half.
A throw-in for the home team on the opposite half.
Denis Glushakov of Khimki gets in a strike, but is off target.
In the minute 82, It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Krasnodar in their own half.
Throw-in for Khimki in their own half.
In the minute 83, Throw-in Krasnodar.
It's a goal kick for the away team in Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov awards the home team a throw-in.
In the minute 85, At Arena Khimki, Khimki are penalized for being offside.
Free kick for Krasnodar in their own half.
Khimki have a goal kick.
In the minute 87, Throw-in high up the field for Khimki in Khimki.
Khimki have a dangerous throw-in.
Goal kick for Krasnodar at Arena Khimki.
In the minute 89, Sergei Ivanov signals a free kick to Khimki.
Important block from the Krasnodar defence as Reziuan Mirzov fires in a strike for Khimki.
3 minutes will be added to the 2nd half in Khimki.
Sergei Ivanov signals a throw-in for Krasnodar, close to Khimki's area.
Corner awarded to Krasnodar.
Sergei Ivanov blows against Khimki's Mohamed Konate for offside.
The match is over. Final score 1-0.
Ari (Krasnodar) gets a yellow card.
Play has been interrupted briefly in Khimki to check on Aleksandr Filin, who is grimacing with pain.
Reziuan Mirzov (Khimki) has been booked and must now be careful not to get a second yellow card.
